text: __NOTOC__ Year 242 (CCXLII) was a common year starting on Saturday of the Julian calendar. == Events == === By place === ==== Roman Empire ==== * Emperor Gordian III begins fighting against King Shapur I. The Greek philosopher Plotinus joins him and hopes to get first-hand knowledge of Persian and Indian philosophies. * Gordian III leaves the Cimmerian cities in the Bosphorus (Crimea), as the land is now controlled by the Goths. ==== Persia ==== * Shapur I makes an attack on Antioch to drive out the Romans. === By topic === ==== Religion ==== * Patriarch Titus succeeds Patriarch Eugenius I as Patriarch of Constantinople. == Births == * Cao Mao, fourth emperor of the Kingdom of Wei (d. 260) * Saloninus, Roman Emperor (d. 260) * Sun Hao, last emperor of the Kingdom of Wu (d. 284) == Deaths == * Man Chong, adviser to the Kingdom of Wei * Sun Shao, general of the Wu Kingdom (b. 188) Category:240s
